title: Sprint Inspection Assertions
description: Map of story IDs to inspection assertion arrays (non-CRE path, UPPERCASE types)

id.description: Unique assertion ID (format: IA + 3 digits, e.g. IA001)

criterion.description: Which acceptance criterion this assertion verifies

assertion.description: Type-specific assertion data (shape varies by type)
